emails.subject: Wing test needed ASAP
emails.body: Hey, X are on my back about their latest wing design. I need you to send over the first natural frequency by tomorrow. Have a look in your toolkit and see what you can do.

feedback.message: Hi, unfortunately that doesn't quite match our simulations. Try using free vibration with no filtering.
We need a slightly more precise simulation. Try free vibration, 600 kHz sampling frequency and no filtering.
Our in-house testing gives a first natural frequency of 50 Hz. Press back to continue.
